text: falamaa ja' muhamad hwla' alqawm ndhyrana lhm, qalu: hla 'uwti hdha aladhi 'ursl 'iilayna mithl ma 'uwti musaa min mejzat hsyt, wktab nazal jumlatan wahd! qul -ayha alrswl- lhm: 'awalam yakfur alyhwd bima 'uwti musaa min qbl? qalu: fi altawrat walquran sihran taeawunaan fi shrhma, wqalu: nahn bikuli minhuma kafrwn
